job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: <p><strong><u>Site Reliability&nbsp;Engineer</u></strong></p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>Excellent opportunity to be part of this high growth business unit transforming on premise applications to Google Cloud Platform.&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>You will work with a dedicated team to design, configure, deploy, and support enterprise applications to GCP in a large, data intensive environment.&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>RESPONSIBILITIES:</strong>&nbsp;</p><ul><li>Work with business and IT team to transform enterprise applications from on prem to GCP</li><li>Design, configure, deploy, and triage applications into production</li><li>Code deployment utilizing terraform</li><li>CI/CD&nbsp;</li><li>Write scripts, performance monitoring</li><li>Support and on call duties&nbsp;</li><li>Document new processes</li></ul><p><br></p><p>This is an excellent 6+ month contract opportunity working with&nbsp;a high growth business unit as they transform to GCP. Outstanding opportunity to learn and grow your skills in a team that is seeking innovation in product and technology. Potential for conversion to full time employment. Ideally in Saint Louis or Atlanta but you can work 100% remotely.&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>REQUIRED SKILLS:</strong></p><ul><li>5+ years as an SRE - Site Reliability Engineer&nbsp;</li><li>GCP - 1 year - experience deploying code to cloud platforms</li><li>Experience deploying/supporting .Net/C# applications&nbsp;</li><li>Windows&nbsp;and related scripting skills in PowerShell, Python, or Bash</li><li>Knowledge of CI/CD, Jenkins pipelines</li><li>Excellent troubleshooting skills and a problem-solver mindset</li></ul><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p><strong>PREFERRED SKILLS:</strong></p><ul><li>Kubernetes - certifications&nbsp;</li><li>GKE&nbsp;</li><li>AppDynamics&nbsp;&nbsp;</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p>
